<title level="1" right="Rules">[Level-Based DCs](/Rules.aspx?ID=681)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 522 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The hazard’s level indicates what level of party it’s a good challenge for. If the hazard involves a toxin, curse, or other non-spell feature, that feature’s level is the hazard’s level.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
